is a large village in the North Kesteven district of
Ruskington is on the north-south B1188 road and north of the A153 road. The village has a small railway station operated by East Midlands Trains on the
line. There are rail connections, via

, to Lincoln, and to Grantham where there are further connections Nottingham,  Peterborough and London. A Stagecoach company bus route from Sleaford to Lincoln stops at Ruskington, Metheringham and villages between.
Ruskington is suitable for walking and cycling. A 15-to-30 minute walk to would, typically, take-in the whole village.
